attributes.action: Cancel Article 50 and Remain in EU
attributes.additional_details:
It is NOT reasonably clear to UK citizens what THE FULL IMPACT of BREXIT will be to their lives and their next generations.

It is NOT clear that the UK cannot negotiate a proper review of membership terms WITHIN the EU.

It is NOT CLEAR the government has negotiated the BEST TERMS of BREXIT.
attributes.background: Following the recent European Court of Justice ruling relating to UK Brexit AS WELL AS my feeling based on the principle of informed consent having not been satisfied by Brexiteers, I petition for UK to disregard Brexit, cancel Article 50 and REMAIN in EU UNTIL FULL, PROPER DISCLOSURE IS CLARIFIED.
